DOC.brief_summary: This study seek develop perform control efficacy Randomized Controlled Trial assess tobacco abstinence best-practices Web-based smoking cessation intervention combine Mobile intervention . Study participant randomize one two condition : Web Only intervention Web+Mobile intervention . The hypothesis Web+Mobile approach yield great efficacy Web Only condition .
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim project : 1 . Use iterative formative development process create two separate Web-based smoking cessation program ( Web+Mobile , Web Only ) . 2 . Compare efficacy two smoke cessation program term tobacco abstinence . The investigator hypothesize Web+Mobile condition significantly efficacious term tobacco abstinence Web Only condition . 3 . Evaluate program usage/participant engagement , treatment acceptability , consumer satisfaction . The investigator hypothesize condition acceptable Web+Mobile condition significantly great usage high consumer satisfaction Web Only condition . 4 . Evaluate compare intervention cost incremental cost-effectiveness ( cost per-participant cost per-quit ) two experimental condition . The secondary aim proposal : 1 . Evaluate difference condition ancillary tobacco outcome . The investigator hypothesize participant assign Web+Mobile condition continue smoke nonetheless report great decline smoking rate quit attempt . 2 . Evaluate predictor condition moderator tobacco abstinence . The investigator conduct exploratory analysis association treatment outcomes participant characteristic ( e.g. , baseline smoking rate , nicotine dependence level , partner 's tobacco use , prior quit attempt , prior use pharmacological adjunct , demographic factor ) . 3 . Evaluate putative mechanism change . The investigator test whether change putative mechanism change ( i.e. , self-efficacy , program use , use pharmacological adjunct ) mediate association intervention condition 3-month sustain abstinence 3 month 6 month assessment .
DOC.criteria: ≥ 18 year age Cigarettes primary tobacco use Smoke ≥ 10 cigs/day previous 6 month Want quit next 30 day Use smartphone willing potentially receive/send 70 text message duration program Access Internet daily Have valid personal email address Be U.S. citizen Current recent ( past 30day ) use smoke cessation product treatment
